==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Takugen:''' The theme isn't bad, but as for the plot... I wonder if it's good enough...
:'''Takugen:''' Ah, Traveler! My apologies. I got distracted for a moment thinking about light novels...
:'''Takugen:''' Is there anything I can help you with?
:{{DIcon|TCG}} About [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]]...
::'''Takugen:''' Oh, that's right, I'm the one in charge of Zero Hour Invokation. Are you here to play?
::'''Takugen:''' You're welcome to build your deck here. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask me.
::'''Takugen:''' Your opponent [[Secchu Tou]] is ready to begin. You may start the match anytime once you're prepared.
::{{Black Screen|Secchu Tou accepted your challenge, and has come to the table...}}
::{{A|vo card ayaka event invite start 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' We're in a real competition, so please don't feel obliged to go easy on me.
::{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
::;(Open [[Duel! The Summoners' Summit!/Zero Hour Invokation|Zero Hour Invokation]] interface)
::;(Win the match)
::::{{A|vo card ayaka event invite fail 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Phew... I really was beaten by the best.
::;(Lose the match)
::::{{A|vo card ayaka event invite win 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' Were you distracted during our match? Hehe, I could tell.
::{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::::{{A|vo card ayaka event invite leave 01.ogg}} '''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I'll be looking into building a more optimal deck. It's a formal competition after all, and I shouldn't make a fool of myself.
:{{DIcon}} About Zero Hour Invokation...
::'''Takugen:''' Oh, that's right, I'm the one in charge of Zero Hour Invokation. Are you here to play?
::'''Takugen:''' You're welcome to build your deck here. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask me.
::'''Takugen:''' Your opponent Secchu Tou is ready to begin. You may start the match anytime once you're prepared.
:{{DIcon}} About the mechanical paintings...
::'''Takugen:''' Mr. [[Félix Yogue|Félix]]'s mechanical paintings are right over here! Oh, what intricate works of art... Even I have tried them many times myself.
::'''Takugen:''' It's such a pleasure to enjoy works like these...
::'''Takugen:''' Ah, I'm sorry... Let's get back to the topic.
::'''Takugen:''' If you're interested in trying the mechanical paintings, you should head over and take a look.
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...
::'''Takugen:''' That's alright, I won't be going anywhere for a while. I have a job to do after all...
::'''Takugen:''' If you're interested in trying Zero Hour Invokation, you're welcome to find me anytime.
{{Dialogue End}}
